about_the_game:
This DLC features a full PDF copy of "Beyond the Western Deep: Volume One," containing over 100 pages of content that continues the story of Quinlan and Dakkan from Wintersdawn in the Deep as they set out to stop war from breaking out in the harsh northern lands of Aisling.

But as the two of them will quickly learn, the situation in the north is far more complicated than they were led to believe. When a ruthless warlord enters the picture hell-bent on setting his people free from generations of oppression, a chain of events begins to unfurl that could thrust the known world into endless conflict, stretching far beyond the borders of the Western Deep...
